name: Hive Quest (itch)
description:
(This game is in early development :P  )

Survive amongst a mythical woodland filled with ancient magic, strange creatures & intriguing puzzles. As the Hive Mind, you embark upon a dangerous and sometimes dark journey to find safety for your insect tribe. Inspired by folklore & fairy legend, Hive Quest is a Real Time Strategy trip into a whimsical world that is intended to delight and entertain.

Players of Hive Quest play as an omnipresent entity in charge of micro-managing the growth of their insect colony. Laying eggs, building new hive sections, managing resources and exploring a mysterious woodland filled with magic and oddity are important elements of game play.

 Warfare is also an ever present reality, with Insect colonies engaging in swift and deadly skirmishes, or subterfuge and theft. Players can also acquire a magical creature that assists with spell components and uncovering secrets that may open up new areas or upgrades. 

With a large dollop of craziness, humour and the magic of the Wild Woods, be ready to spend time dancing with the fey!

Coming to PC on Steam

This is an EARLY DEMO VERSION - intended to provide a taste of what is to come for Hive Quest. 

Yuna the guide will show you how to play :)

There has been so much amazing support for the game on Twitter & elsewhere that I felt it was time to show the world what's been going on so far.

Though there's bound to be a few bugs here & there, but I'm constantly improving things so please be patient.

Also, please keep an eye out for the forthcoming KICKSTARTER campaign - and don't forget to tell your friends   ;D

Thanks for taking an interest!

Rod
